text: Hi All, we are looking for someone to join our business as a *full-time CRM specialist in London (UK)* . You will play a critical role in developing and maintaining SaaS (Software as a Service) solutions tailored for our marketing and sales teams. You will primarily work with HubSpot as our main software platform and also integrate Microsoft 365 (M365) products into our technology stack. We are looking for someone who has experience with the day to day functioning of HubSpot and has familiarity with web development languages (e.g., HTML, CSS, JavaScript) for frontend customizations.) We are based at One Canada Square, Canary Wharf, London and any queries or applications can be sent to <mailto:hr@theworkperk.com|hr@theworkperk.com>. Thanks!
